=========================

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1NHNOY_00
From: PayPal Communications <no_reply@communications.paypal.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-10 20:22
Subject: We're making some changes to our PayPal legal agreements
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hagop Ghazarian, you can view the changes on our website.

	Hello, Hagop Ghazarian	 
 <https://www.paypalobjects.com/digitalassets/c/system-triggered-email/n/layout/images/ppe/pp-logo_x2.png> 	
We're making some changes to our legal agreements that will apply to you.

There is no action needed from you today, but if you would like to learn more, you can find details about these changes, when they apply and what you can do if you want to decline the changes on our policy update page <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/QTteCzxLjS4OPK3S4fBU9abXS?domain=paypal.com> . You can also view these changes by visiting PayPal.com, clicking 'Legal' at the bottom of the page and then selecting 'Policy Updates'.
